participant_1.background:
My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
My family works in various fields, but we all have a passion for life.
I live in California, where I am pursuing my dream of becoming a fashion designer.
I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue.

participant_2.background:
I do not have a car, but I love collecting toys wearing little rain coats with my family.
I bought my first journal when I was 12 years old to help me cope with the bullying I was experiencing at school.
I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets.
i enjoy going to festivals.
i am nurse.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy going to festivals and exercising daily.
That sounds fun! I like to go to festivals too. What's your favorite type of festival?
I like music festivals the most. I love to dance and sing along to the music.
Me too! I love the energy and excitement of music festivals.
I also enjoy going to food festivals. I love trying new foods from different cultures.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a food festival before.
You should definitely go to one! They're so much fun and you get to try all sorts of delicious food.
I will have to check it out! Do you have any other hobbies?
I also love to read and write. I'm a nurse and I love to write about my experiences at work.
That's so cool! I love to read too. I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love finding new authors and books to read.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too! I'd love to be friends.
